title: GadgetSnap
summary: A project to build a machine learning model that predicts suitable smartphones based on consumer-defined specifications.
highlights: A project for the Algorithm of Programming II course, involving 2 members, aimed at applying Machine Learning through a website within a 2-month timeframe.
The objective was to assist users in finding mobile phones based on desired specifications using classification methods.
Managed the backend by utilizing Flask to connect the Machine Learning model with the website and performing web scraping, resulting in a total of 187 data entries.

title: Cholesterol Classification Prediction
summary: A machine learning project designed to predict cholesterol levels based on patient health data.
highlights: This project focuses on predicting the classification of an individual's cholesterol based on health indicators to identify which variables influence cholesterol levels.
Performed model interpretation and analysis of the results.
Deployed the model using Streamlit by creating a user-friendly interface to showcase the model's capabilities.

title: Product Sales Performance Dashboard
summary: This dashboard is designed to comprehensively monitor and analyze product sales performance across multiple stores.
highlights: Profit trends remained relatively stable with slight fluctuations from 2020 to 2022.
The Nova brand dominated both sales volume and total profit.
Partner and reseller channels were the main contributors to revenue.
The highest concentration of sales occurred on the island of Java.

title: Employees Performance Dashboard
summary: The Employees Performance Dashboard is designed to help management comprehensively monitor human resource conditions, including employee performance, attendance rates, and job satisfaction.
highlights: Customer Service, Product, and Operations departments show the highest average performance.
Sales and Marketing departments have relatively lower performance scores compared to other departments.
Positions such as QA Engineer, Operations Manager, and Warehouse Supervisor demonstrate the highest performance.
The scatter plot shows a positive correlation between training hours and performance scores.
Employees classified as High and Excellent performers have more consistent attendance rates.

title: BRI Liga 1 Dashboard
summary: This dashboard presents visualizations of BRI Liga 1 2024/25 player statistics. In this project, player data was independently collected through web scraping from Transfermarkt, then processed, cleaned, and visualized into an interactive dashboard to generate informative insights.
highlights: Several players such as Sonny Stevens, Nadeo Argawinata, and LÃºcio recorded the highest playing minutes.
Players originate from various cities, with a strong concentration from Jakarta, Surabaya, and Kediri.
